title: Frontend Engineer
summary: Build world-class UIs for Google Search and Ads products using React and TypeScript.
description:
We are looking for a Frontend Engineer to join the Google Search team. You will design and implement high-performance, accessible user interfaces used by billions of people every day. You'll work closely with UX designers and backend engineers to ship features that delight users.

Requirements:
• 3+ years of experience with React or Angular
• Strong TypeScript / JavaScript skills
• Experience with performance optimization
• Familiarity with accessibility standards (WCAG)
• CS degree or equivalent experience

title: Machine Learning Engineer
summary: Power Spotify's recommendation engine using deep learning and large-scale data pipelines.
description:
Join the Personalization team at Spotify and help 500M+ users discover music they love. You'll build and deploy ML models for recommendations, search ranking, and playlist generation.

Requirements:
• MS/PhD in CS, ML, or related field
• Experience with PyTorch or TensorFlow
• Proficiency in Python and SQL
• Experience with large-scale data processing (Spark, Beam)
• Published research is a plus

title: Backend Engineer
summary: Design APIs and distributed systems that move money for millions of businesses worldwide.
description:
Stripe is looking for Backend Engineers to build reliable, scalable payment infrastructure. You will design APIs, work on distributed systems, and ensure 99.999% uptime for critical financial flows.

Requirements:
• 4+ years backend experience (Ruby, Java, Go, or Python)
• Deep understanding of distributed systems
• Experience with relational databases and caching layers
• Strong testing and debugging skills
• Bonus: experience with payment or fintech systems

title: Product Designer
summary: Shape the future of collaborative design tools used by millions of designers worldwide.
description:
Figma is hiring a Product Designer to work on core editor features. You will own end-to-end design — from research and wireframes to high-fidelity prototypes and final polish.

Requirements:
• 3+ years of product design experience
• Expert-level Figma skills
• Strong portfolio demonstrating systems thinking
• Experience conducting user research
• Ability to work cross-functionally with engineering and PM

title: Research Engineer
summary: Push the frontier of AI safety and capabilities at the world's leading AI lab.
description:
OpenAI is looking for Research Engineers to contribute to training, evaluating, and deploying frontier AI models. You'll work at the intersection of research and engineering, turning novel ideas into production systems.

Requirements:
• Strong software engineering skills (Python, C++)
• Experience with deep learning frameworks
• Understanding of transformer architectures
• Ability to read and implement ML research papers
• Passion for AI safety

title: Full Stack Engineer
summary: Build features across the entire stack for the world's largest hospitality platform.
description:
Airbnb is hiring Full Stack Engineers for the Guest Experience team. You'll build features that help travelers find and book unique stays around the world.

Requirements:
• 3+ years with React/Next.js
• Backend experience with Node.js or Ruby on Rails
• GraphQL and REST API design
• Mobile-first responsive design skills
• Strong communication and collaboration

title: Embedded Software Engineer
summary: Write safety-critical firmware for Tesla's next-generation vehicle platforms.
description:
Tesla is looking for Embedded Software Engineers to develop firmware for vehicle control systems. You'll write low-level code that directly controls hardware in safety-critical environments.

Requirements:
• 3+ years embedded C/C++ experience
• RTOS experience (FreeRTOS, QNX)
• Understanding of CAN, SPI, I2C protocols
• Experience with hardware debugging tools
• Automotive or aerospace background preferred

title: Data Engineer
summary: Build the data platform powering personalization and content analytics for 250M+ subscribers.
description:
Netflix is hiring a Data Engineer to build and maintain the data pipelines that power our recommendation and analytics systems.

Requirements:
• 4+ years of data engineering experience
• Expert SQL and Python skills
• Experience with Spark, Flink, or Kafka
• Knowledge of data warehousing (Snowflake, BigQuery, or Redshift)
• Experience building real-time and batch pipelines

title: iOS Engineer
summary: Craft a beautiful, blazing-fast mobile experience for Notion's all-in-one workspace.
description:
Notion is looking for an iOS Engineer to help build and optimize the Notion app for iPhone and iPad. You'll work on rich text editing, offline sync, and delightful animations.

Requirements:
• 3+ years iOS development (Swift)
• Deep understanding of UIKit and SwiftUI
• Experience with offline-first architectures
• Performance profiling and optimization
• Attention to design and micro-interactions

title: DevOps Engineer
summary: Scale infrastructure that powers 2M+ merchants and handles Black Friday traffic spikes.
description:
Shopify is hiring a DevOps Engineer to build and maintain cloud infrastructure serving millions of merchants. You'll work on CI/CD, observability, and incident response.

Requirements:
• 3+ years DevOps / SRE experience
• Strong Kubernetes and Docker skills
• Terraform or Pulumi for IaC
• Experience with AWS or GCP
• On-call rotation experience
